meanings.sent1: In Islam, the nikah is a sacred agreement between a man and a woman.
meanings.sent2: The nikah is signed by both parties before the wedding ceremony.
meanings.sent3: During the nikah, the couple promised to love and support each other.
meanings.sent4: The nikah is like a binding promise that unites two people in marriage.
meanings.sent5: The nikah ceremony was filled with joy and celebration.

meanings.definition: The act of entering into a marriage contract.
meanings.sent1: Their nikah marked the beginning of their life together as a married couple.
meanings.sent2: After the nikah, they officially became husband and wife.
meanings.sent3: The nikah was a joyful occasion that brought families together.
meanings.sent4: Entering into the nikah symbolized their commitment to each other.
meanings.sent5: The nikah ceremony was a beautiful celebration of love and unity.

meanings.definition: To perform the Islamic marriage ceremony.
meanings.sent1: The Imam will nikah the couple in front of their families and friends.
meanings.sent2: They decided to nikah in the mosque with their loved ones present.
meanings.sent3: The couple will nikah next weekend at the local Islamic center.
meanings.sent4: The Imam will nikah them according to the traditions of Islam.
meanings.sent5: They plan to nikah in a traditional Islamic ceremony.
